EmailTemplate.name: DH AU autoReply
EmailTemplate.subject: Your request to Delivery Hero
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your Email. We have received your request and will do our best to process it as soon as possible. Please give us one working day for processing.
For urgent inquiries please contact us via phone: 1300 MY MEAL
Please do not reply to this message. Thank you for your understanding.
Your Delivery Hero Team
{!User.Company} {!User.Street} {!User.City} {!User.PostalCode} contact@deliveryhero.com.au www.deliveryhero.com.au Director: Scott Fletcher ABN: 26 152 250 274
